mapper.select: select row.*, cnt.count as count from(select info_id as infoid, name, cpu_socket as socket, cpu_manufacture as manufacture, cpu_core as core, cpu_thread as thread, baseclock, boosterclock, L3cache as cache, tdp from CPU_INFO where name like concat('%',#{q},'%') and useFlag ='Y' and info_id in(1,2) order by id asc limit 9 offset ${p})row ,(select count(id) as count from CPU_INFO where useFlag= 'Y' and info_id in(1,2) and name like concat('%',#{q},'%'))cnt

select row.*, cnt.count as count from(select info_id as infoid, name, gpu_value as value, gpu_manufacture as manufacture, gpu_clock as clock, gpu_stream as stream, gpu_ram as ram from GPU_INFO where name like concat('%',#{q},'%') and useFlag ='Y' and info_id = 3 order by id asc limit 6 offset ${p})row ,(select count(id) as count from GPU_INFO where useFlag= 'Y' and info_id = 3 and name like concat('%',#{q},'%'))cnt
